short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a set of your favorite tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extensions provides a button in Chrome that opens a set of default (favorite) tabs. You can specify the URLs for the tabs to open in the extension options as well as which tabs (if any) you want pinned.
